website_summaries.verdict: Whether it's a gift or for personal use, this shaker stands out for durability and delicious results. Easily the best available.
pros: Numerous features include a bar spoon and wooden muddler
Also comes with a handy cocktail-making guide
cons: Shaker tends to leak, although this can be remedied by using the appropriate amount of ice to create a solid seal

customer_reviews.title: Not very good, gets the job done if you have nothing else.
customer_reviews.text: To start, I bartend. We have tons of sets of great shakers that seal like magic. This set, however, does not. I've seen reviews saying people realized "They weren't doing it right." No, you have been doing it just fine. It should seal so tight you could shake it with one hand. Mine does not, unless I jam it in there with all my might. Mine is also slanted. It is what it is. Just know that this is not top quality, but it will work if it's all you've got.
customer_reviews.author: Jake S

customer_reviews.title: Great high quality set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cocktail set for my girlfriend who is a bartender and she loves it. All parts are very high quality and durable. The glass that is included with the shaker is actually a pint glass so the shaker can be used with any pint glass and it sits nice and low. This is nice because my girlfriend has small hands and she can still shake with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: mamastarfish

customer_reviews.title: works beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: Got this set after looking around the ineternet for a long long time for a boston shaker. I find this is the best set that is closest to what one would actually use in a bar setting. I havent had one issue with seals on the glass and shaker part - the slightly off center fit is what is neccessary to create the good seal to shake drinks. It really is a great product. The accessories are not the highest quality but they do the job. I like th emuddler and I actually do like the 25 ml and 50mL measuring cups as many recipes call for mLs instead of ounces. it's helpful.
customer_reviews.author: MamaRoche

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pieces though not packaged for gifting.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be a gift intended for a more sophisticated novice mixologist friend. The set is of good quality utilitarian pieces, not really decorative and not packaged well. The pieces come in a cardboard box with weak and torn cut out holes for the pieces wrapped in bubble wrap. When I checked inside the box, the pieces were tossed about but undamaged. I replaced them into the proper cutouts and taped them in place for gifting. I didn't see measure markings on the jiggers so the novice mixologist will need to think about the proper part measure ratios for drink recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Filmfoodie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Barware Set!
customer_reviews.text: The set came in incredibly quickly and was packaged really well - a nice presentation. It honestly exceeded my expectations! All of the pieces of the set are a high quality and are obviously durable. I really quite genuinely can't find any faults with it at all! The small cocktail book is quite a nice bonus as well - really looking forward to trying out a few of them over the holidays! I am giving this to my husband for Christmas and am definitely considering purchasing more of these for gifts in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, shipping, and service
customer_reviews.text: I received the Win-Ware Boston Cocktail Shaker Gift Set promptly. The packaging was great, the product as described. I went ahead and did a practice of adding ice, water, sealing, shaking, releasing, and pouring. It was no problem at all. Very easy to handle. Then I put it in my cupboard...and forgot to make a drink since!!! Then Win-Ware representative phoned me to ask how my product arrived and if I was satisfied. That was an extra nice touch; particularly with their British accent...but I digress. Now I am going to make sure this weekend has a few cocktails included thanks to my Win-Ware Boston Cocktail Shaker Gift Set. You won't be disappointed! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: R. Harry

customer_reviews.title: Use this set all the time
customer_reviews.text: The shaker is easy to use and clean and works great. The muddler isn't the best as after a friend of mine used it a little rough, the finish already started to chip off along the bottom. Everything else works great, is easy to clean, and looks great sitting up on my bar just waiting to be used.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tormoen

customer_reviews.title: Beginners set
customer_reviews.text: Neat little set. The pocket drink guide is tiny but if you have good eyes youre all set. Shaker and glass are well made along with the shot glasses. Muddler is a nice solid wood. Everything looks good, well packaged, and will definitely make a good drink.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my husband ahead of time. On the first use the spoon broke, literally snapped off it's stick while being used to gently stir a drink. Very cheaply made. Since I had purchased ahead of time, I missed the return window by THREE days! Would have returned it. A spoon shouldn't just fall off it's handle. We have had cheap "give away" bar spoons that have been around over 10 years, this didn't make it through one drink..... very disappointed! Stay away!
customer_reviews.author: c.l. caulfield

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Beginner's Set
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. I've been using it since day one and haven't had an issue with them at all! One thing I noticed about my shaker tin is that it seems to start rusting from the inside when I let it dry so I always use a cloth to dry it after washing it.
customer_reviews.author: Khaled Alfayez

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Boston Shaker Set!
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice Boston Shaker Set! This Boston Shaker Set has worked great for me. I am sure you have already read about how the glass and tumbler works. Its not hard to use at all. I liked that the set came with a jigger and double jigger if needed. The other tools work as they should and I haven't had a problem with them. If you have had a cocktail at a bar you have probably seen this shaker used. I recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: DPS

customer_reviews.title: A real cocktail shaker at last
customer_reviews.text: A perfect cocktail shaker, and the perfect gift. I've been looking for a real shaker forever at various does but thanks to the cocktail chemistry YouTube channel I can acids this one. The glass top doesn't leak and comes of super easy after shaking!
customer_reviews.author: Stefan Kincaid

customer_reviews.title: My only complaint is minimal and it's that the two "jiggers" are not in english units but are in SI which is a slight annoyance
customer_reviews.text: The shaker doesn't spill any liquid at all, you just need to watch some youtube videos on how to properly create the seal. My only complaint is minimal and it's that the two "jiggers" are not in english units but are in SI which is a slight annoyance but something I can easily get over. The strainer works great and so does the mixing spoon, haven't had any issues with either. Overall great product, just a minor complaint on the "jigger" sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Clark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my fiance, and let me tell you, he LOVES it. He uses it every chance he can to try out a new cocktail. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Farley

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with my cocktail set
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with my cocktail set. I was looking for a starter set, and the Winware set had everything I needed. The feedback was was very good from reviewers so I went ahead with the set. A lot of the other sets included some irrelevant extras which I didn't want or need, which I knew would mean a higher quality set. The quality of the product was very high, especially the heavy stirring glass which I know will withstand heavy use in the future. Definitely a product I would recommend to a friend. Attached picture if of the first cocktail I made with the set, the "Aviation". Definitely a drink to try!
customer_reviews.author: IAmLegend

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Arrived on time and exactly as described. I use this for bartending jobs and it works great. The tin is not as thick as others I've used but it works just as well. Would definitely but again but I don't think I will need to replace this set anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Grace

customer_reviews.title: Works Well Initially but Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: Initially, the shaker worked well with no problems. However, the tin failed to seal after about 40 uses, rendering the shaker useless. Look elsewhere if you want a more durable product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ocean

customer_reviews.title: I was missing a piece from the kit and the pieces inside arrived dirty.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bartender and needed a set for at home for my birthday party tomorrow. The shaker does not make a seal, for one. For two, I was missing a piece from the kit and the pieces inside arrived dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FUN! I won't be hired as a bartender ...
customer_reviews.text: GREAT FUN! I won't be hired as a bartender any time soon, but have a great time experimenting!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen C.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product. It rusted within the first use. I should have paid attention to some of the other reviews which mentioned the same. I went with the overwhelming 5 star reviews. Will look for an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: soothsayer

customer_reviews.title: Ideal
customer_reviews.text: Great set, with UK measures. I prefer a sturdier muddler so I picked another one up, but that is down to personal preference. The one that is included is fine for mint ect. The mixing glass is sturdy enough for those who have a strong hit (like I do) and there is no leakage when used with the boston shaker. Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Well made, well priced, decent kit that has all the essentials to start making cocktails. I have only started using it, so cannot say much for longevity of the product. I bought this kit with intention to use at home and it works great! I am sure though it would stand up just as well to the professional (bar, restaurant) use. Very friendly customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Liza

customer_reviews.title: and works great. Nothing wrong with it
customer_reviews.text: Product is as expected, and works great. Nothing wrong with it. Got it as a housewarming gift and I was kind of hoping the presentation/packaging would have been a little nicer. That said, I'd rather pay for a good product than excessive packaging that just gets thrown away. If you're looking for a set for yourself it's great. If you're looking to give away as a gift consider repackaging... If that's your thing.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Great for the aspiring mixologist or casual home bartender
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality cocktail set. I prefer the Boston shaker to the cobbler shaker and this Boston shaker is one of the best I have owned. I have not used the jiggers as I prefer my OXO angled stainless steel jigger, but they seem of high quality. The Hawthorne strainer and muddler work very well and the bar spoon is just as good as others on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Derek H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bartender Starter Set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bartender starter kit. Package arrived within 2 days of order. It was packed well and all pieces were in place and are of good quality. We are delighted and have already started serving our friends.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Dismore

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: All the necessary tools you need for a good Mojito and cocktails. I got this for my wife so she can make drinks for all her friends and feel special! lol. Heck I make a good ole stiff drink from time to time with it. Great prodcuct and just what you need for the social drinker.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Cocktail Set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cocktail set as a gift and it is absolutely perfect! It is one of the few cocktail sets out there that has EVERYTHING you need and the price is unbeatable. I was concerned when I read reviews that complained about it not coming in a box/container but I ordered it anyway and was very pleased with I received it. It comes in a nice cardboard box that hold everything in place and can be easily gift wrapped. I don't think anyone would actually keep a cocktail set in a box, it's meant to be put out and used. My friend loved the set and uses it frequently. I would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Susana

customer_reviews.title: Good set up
customer_reviews.text: Had everything we need to make old fashioned at home! Exactly what we were looking for!! Prompt delivery too.
customer_reviews.author: suzee brein

customer_reviews.title: A really useful cocktail shaker set
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set a while ago and have really had fun using it. I originallly got it for the muddler, so I could make mohitos at home. Then I went online and started looking up recipes for other cocktails and am having fun trying them all out. The set is good quality, and I'm sure it will last me a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Robin R

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: For a small start up company, they have the right ambition, solid product, good quality on each of the items contained. Talked with staff as well, very pleasant. Mixing set is attractive and solid in the hands, it fits in perfect with the bar section.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: I am incredibly pleased with my WIN-WARE Boston Cocktail Shaker Set and have ...
customer_reviews.text: I am incredibly pleased with my WIN-WARE Boston Cocktail Shaker Set and have recommended it to several of my friends. My order arrived in a timely fashion and all items were packed with care. Like another reviewer, I'm not the biggest fan of the jiggers and prefer a traditional double-sided jigger. However, that is just merely my preference and not a reflection on the quality of the jiggers in this set. WIN-WARE also provides amazing customer service and answered all of my questions in a timely and considerate manner.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Use it all the time
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift and he loves it. We dont use the jiggers or the muddler as we had those already, but the shaker, strainer and spoon work great and we use them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with purchase. Great quality and zero problems. The reviews that say it leaks on them are proably being used incorrectly. If you know how to properly use and shake you will not have any leakage. Great set up and a must have.
customer_reviews.author: busterlv

customer_reviews.title: Good home bar set
customer_reviews.text: Really nice set of barware, especially for the price. The glass that comes with the Boston shaker was mediocre but not bad. The muddler isn't the best quality either but it gets the job done for a home bar set.
customer_reviews.author: thevaiter

customer_reviews.title: ... you're an experienced bartender or just doing it for fun this is a really nice set to invest in
customer_reviews.text: If you're an experienced bartender or just doing it for fun this is a really nice set to invest in. While I wasn't overly crazy about the packaging ( I was thinking I could reuse the box to store the set). It's well worth the price. The shipping was prompted and the quality is pretty good. If I had any complaints I wish the jiggers were actually stamped with the size. I use a pour count so it wasn't problem for me but I could see it becoming an issue with someone starting out.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Seymore

customer_reviews.title: Boston cocktail set...
customer_reviews.text: Got a set like this for Christmas for my sister-in-law but it was gone when I wanted one for myself. This had the same things but didn't come in a nice box like the other one. Good quality though.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Shank

customer_reviews.title: Great cocktail set!
customer_reviews.text: Great cocktail set, bought this as a gift for a friend of mine and he loves it. The items are made of good quality materials and have a really nice design. Recommended product!
customer_reviews.author: A. Taffo

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect set for cocktail making
customer_reviews.text: What a great product! I bought this set because it included a nice looking muddler. But upon opening I was very impressed by the quality of everything included in this set. A wonderful feature that I love is the glass with the shaker. I have been mixing drinks in the shaker, and simply turning it upside down and BAM I'm good to go. I highly recommend this set for anyone looking to mix a few cocktails for a party or anywhere. Brilliant service I may add as well. I got everything very quickly and it was shipped with care.
customer_reviews.author: jake tweito

customer_reviews.title: This cocktail set is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This cocktail set has worked amazingly for me. I started out making basic cocktails, which it was great for. But now I've been expanding my horizons, making more complex cocktails, and it's given me no problems. If you're jumping on the craft cocktail trend, this is definitely a great set to start with, and hopefully work with for a long time. Also, it's a plus that the muddler comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Yama Almas

customer_reviews.title: all high quality and looks sleek and nice on the bar
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set for my Fiance's birthday and we have used it almost every day since then. It has all the essentials, all high quality and looks sleek and nice on the bar. We love it - 5 stars for this gem. I also recently got a phone call from the Win-ware founder to ask how i liked the product. That is damn good customer service!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: I love this set
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! I wanted something that would go nicely in my home bar especially when making Old Fashions. It gives you everything you need to make drinks like you are at a speakeasy bar! Love it and the quality is excellent!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Miakel Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for Professional Mixologist - Great Quality and Price Point
customer_reviews.text: This product delivered in 2 days. This product was recommended by a fellow Mixologist who swears by this company. He is also in the Culinary field and recommended the win-ware culinary carving tool set (a bargain for the quality and quantity). The design of the set is very elegant. I am sure my guests will be loving all drinks that come out of this set. You truly cannot get better for the price, quality, and design. I recommend purchasing other products from this company as well.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Ruttan

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Set!
customer_reviews.text: I have not put this set down since I bought it. I'm a Bartender at a Greek restaraunt and I use the set every night. Each drink is shaken to perfection and its extremely easy to clean. 100% happy with this purchase! I even received a personal call from the staff themselves! I truly appreciate the feeling of being a valued enough customer to be reached out too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's nice, not so much for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice set but it leaks easily when shaking... Maybe I am too much of a beginner for that type of shaker. I think I will get one you can tightly close before shaking in order to avoid the mess.
customer_reviews.author: Lilie Rose

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and all the pieces have a quality feel about them, I have not had them long enough to see how they stand up to wear and tear, but from the feel and heft they should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A very basic set of acceptable quality, more than adequate for home use.
customer_reviews.author: LA Dawson

customer_reviews.title: This set is perfect for anybody looking to make a quality cocktail at ...
customer_reviews.text: This set is perfect for anybody looking to make a quality cocktail at home. I originally bought this as a gift for my sister-in-law but after seeing it I plan on getting one for myself as well. You get everything you could possibly need in this set and they really are great quality items. The customer service of this company is exceptional as well!
customer_reviews.author: Cailey Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Bottoms up!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my son. He loves it. It was just what he needed / wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Hill

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! You wouldn't think so but it was hard to find a glass that would fit in the metal bottom part of a shaker exactly the way it is supposed to so that u get a good seal unless you buy it as a set. Love the stirring spoon, like that the jiggers are not angled bc it makes it easier to estimate halves of ounces if a recipe calls for 1.5 oz of something. Overall a great buy! Even came with some recipes for several cocktails!
customer_reviews.author: Martina Soltes

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Set mixes up tasty beverages.
customer_reviews.text: The shaker set delivers. The glass is hefty and creates a good seal when used with the steel shaker. Both jiggers help measure accordingly as the best cocktails begin with the right proportions. I highly recommend this product as well as Win-Ware.
customer_reviews.author: Hobart

customer_reviews.title: Very much liked this set
customer_reviews.text: Very much liked this set, purchased it for my boyfriend who is a bartender and has always wanted a set of his own. He likes the weight of the boston shaker, it fits well in his hand and the strainer fits perfect over the top. Very good product and for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cocktail making set, and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I haven't owned a cocktail set before, I looked around at a few sets on Amazon and this one seemed to be a good balance between price and having all the items you'd need to get started. The set looks great - it has everything you need to make most basic cocktails (the included recipe/instructions card comes in handy too), and also makes an great "ornament".
customer_reviews.author: Paul Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality - The bottom fell out of the Jigger
customer_reviews.text: The bottom fell out of the steel jigger! Bad quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna Belan

customer_reviews.title: Great shaker set!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best cocktail shaker set I have ever owned. I did a lot of research on what kind of shaker I wanted and this one appeared to be the best. Everything works as billed. I have used it almost daily for about three weeks now and have not seen any rust on any of the components. Highly recommended, professional bar quality!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Magouirk

customer_reviews.title: The set also is great value--it will be difficult to find a set with ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my partner--we had a few different shakers at home but they went missing over time, and he wanted a more traditional Boston set. He loves it! The set is durable--it's used regularly--and we appreciate being able to support a small business that produces such a reliable product. The set also is great value--it will be difficult to find a set with these pieces of this quality at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Everything was great and I can't wait to use it
customer_reviews.text: Got this item amazingly fast, ordered it one day and got it the next. Everything was great and I can't wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Bastings

customer_reviews.title: Love it! So easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: We are just getting into making drinks at home and this was the only product that sold everything we needed! We love and recommend it to anyone looking to improve their cocktail arsenal! A quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie B. Vidmar

customer_reviews.title: good starter kit
customer_reviews.text: good starter kit, love the boston shaker. the muddler feels quite light, like plastic, but it gets the job done. not a fan of the jiggers
customer_reviews.author: Vibranze

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Materials!
customer_reviews.text: Love my cocktail shaker set! It has everything I need to make any cocktails. Each pieces are made with very good quality. No cheapie material. I highly recommend this set!
customer_reviews.author: Sohee Bae

customer_reviews.title: This shaker works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for my partner's birthday and we've been making delicious martinis all weekend long! This shaker works like a charm: we've never used a shaker before, we followed the instruction, et voila martinis in our glass without any spill! I would recommend this shaker to anybody that likes cocktail!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced. That recipe book is about the size of ...
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced. That recipe book is about the size of a business card.
customer_reviews.author: R. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great set, Great design
customer_reviews.text: This set it great! I bought it as a gift for a friend getting into mixology and they are loving it. They are very picky about design of products coming from a design background and this set passed with flying colors. The suggested cocktails are great as well, so delicious. Its a great piece, especially because it doesn't blow your budget. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Golden

customer_reviews.title: We ordered this before Christmas this year as we were ...
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this before Christmas this year as we were hosting, and my wife was looking for a proper set to make her famous Satsuma Old Fashioned's for all the family. Everything worked as you'd hope, but I will say that my wife uses another muddler that her sister bought her instead of the one that comes in the set, so I can't comment on it specifically.
customer_reviews.author: Keyur J Patel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value and Quality
customer_reviews.text: This barware set and Boston shaker are a great value! All the pieces have held up to weekly use with no sign of wear and tear. Having researched barware before buying the Winware set, I almost bought individual pieces from other vendors, but I'm glad I bought this set!
customer_reviews.author: Collin Dunbar

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Aesthetically Very Pleasing
customer_reviews.text: Its a great product. The equipment came out of the box properly packaged and no scratches or dents were found. The boston shaker included is a perfect addition to any bar.The wood muddler adds a classic feel to the product. It makes great drinks and is very aesthetically pleasing. A perfect item to get as a gift or even for yourself, would definitely recommend/ buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Alisa Islam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for the (non)professional mixologist in your life
customer_reviews.text: Purchased off of a wedding registry. The recipients are enthusiastic hobby-mixologists and were very pleased with the gift. The set comes beautifully packaged and the contents are high quality/clearly crafted with care. I was very happy to have been able to give them something they will enjoy for quite a while to come - and am considering a purchase for myself, even.
customer_reviews.author: Marta Miko

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: shaker does not seal, spills drinks every time you try and shake a cocktail
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: So far I've been mixing some great summer cocktails
customer_reviews.text: So far I've been mixing some great summer cocktails. I like the little booklet and the shot glasses are great, it looks really nice in my bar cart. The seller actually called to check in on the product, which was appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Christina L Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and expedient delivery
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived within a week to my address in Japan. Quality materials that look and feel durable, very neat and professional presentation of each item in the box. I bought this as part of a gift basket and everyone loved it. It even came with a little pamphlet that has cocktail recipes. Great find!
customer_reviews.author: maria1227

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Christmas gift, my fiancé loved it. We haven't used all the pieces yet, but so far so good. He even put the little booklet on display
customer_reviews.author: vmm312

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, well made product. Delivered very quickly, especially since it came from England. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry E

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Set
customer_reviews.text: I looked for a starter set to get myself situated in a new apartment and this one has done the job nicely. Everything is great quality, it shipped quickly and on time, the packaging was nice, and the customer service was very attentive. It seams that I'll be happily making my friends drinks for years to come with this set.
customer_reviews.author: ross

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Simple Set, Great Communication!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great and simple bartender set. Everything was of good quality, despite the box arriving in not so great shape. The set comes with everything that I wanted in a simple, at home bartender set. I was fortunate enough to communicate with the seller on this item, and they were prompt and have great customer service. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: I love this set
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! Everything is beautiful. It's nice to start making cocktails with a complete set of tools, and the recipe booklet is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Kira Mickle

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a good set to own. Nothing fancy, but good quality and very functional.
customer_reviews.author: Oldfrat

customer_reviews.title: Had the alcohol, needed tools, this is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set to start my collection of bar tools. This has everything I needed and is great. Packing was very good and parts are ice and high quality. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Kuehling

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister-in-law as a christmas gift. It arrived in two days as promised and was exactly what I expected - no surprises or disapointments. :) My sister-in-law loves the set and uses it all the time in their new game room with a bar. I would definitely recommend it to anyone with a home bar or anyone that is a lover of mixed drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Conley

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this For my husband whom just finished his bar tending classes & it was a perfect start! the glass fits perfectly. nicely made.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cocktail Set!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for my husband for Father's Day. It's absolutely brilliant. Excellent quality, came quickly and has everything you need to be an immediate expert! He's already made quite a few cocktails with it - great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Therese Parkes

customer_reviews.title: Forget it - you can't make a seal with this ...
customer_reviews.text: Forget it - you can't make a seal with this tin and glass to save your life. A Cobbler shaker is what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Hooten

customer_reviews.title: Classy and masculine
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a gift. Seemed like nice quality, classy and masculine.
customer_reviews.author: A. ReneeTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: perfect cocktail shaker
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a cocktail shaker that is highly functional but attractive and well made, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Henrietta Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does the job and works well, definitely worth the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Ken Tran

customer_reviews.title: Lame.
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived with only three of the pieces. What the heck?!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice product - sturdy and well designed
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice product - sturdy and well designed. I used to be a bartender, and prefer the Boston Shaker style sets. This set is bar quality and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Kudos Win-Ware!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I order a lot on Amazon....I mean a LOT. I have never written a review. This product has a rich feel to it. It's perfect for the bar I am building and enjoying. It has everything you need to make a top notch drink in a top notch bar for a very reasonable cost. I would recommend this as a gift or for yourself. Kudos Win-Ware!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debra L.

customer_reviews.title: A great set for bartending
customer_reviews.text: Great set. Inexpensive, high quality, does exactly what you want. The only thing I might change would be the two separate jiggers to a single double-sided jigger. The ones that they provide are great though.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan D. Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set for new mixologists
customer_reviews.text: I received one of these as a gift and loved it so much that I bought one for someone else. Great quality, everything you need to get started with cocktail mixing at home. Even comes with a book of recipes.
customer_reviews.author: John D M

customer_reviews.title: Boston Cocktail Shaker Gift Set
customer_reviews.text: The WIN-WARE Cocktail Shaker set was just what I wanted. It is well made and worked well for those Holiday drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Clarence Heinz

customer_reviews.title: Quality for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great price for high quality bar tools. The box it comes in makes it a great gift giving option.
customer_reviews.author: I Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this set
customer_reviews.text: I own a bartending service company and I needed this set quickly for a party. The order shipped immediately and every piece was included. It worked well for my classic drink recipes. I recommend this set. If there was a drawback, the shaker glass is thinner, and not as durable as a standard pint glass.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Neville

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift. I have used parts of it at my friends house and it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Rena

customer_reviews.title: ... gift I couldn't really tell you whether it was good or
customer_reviews.text: it was a gift I couldn't really tell you whether it was good or not
customer_reviews.author: Kep

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made kit. The glass-shaker seal would not work.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and I was disappointed to find out the product was not as good as it claimed. I did not gave it away, of course. The stainless steel shaker and the little measurement glasses were poorly made (we had to use sandpaper on the edges of them so they would not cut our fingers when washing them). The shaker would not fit the glass properly and it would not create the required seal to mix the cocktails. The spoon had black stains on it and they would not come off after washing it. The only good thing about the kit is the glass. I would not recommend you to buy this kit at all.
customer_reviews.author: IME

customer_reviews.title: She loved it and was really happy to have the bar ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend who was a bartender at one time. She loved it and was really happy to have the bar spoon! We've used it a few times and are pleased with the entire set.
customer_reviews.author: T. Henson

customer_reviews.title: I look like the cool aunt
customer_reviews.text: I have a friend in the liquor business who highly recommended this set. It's well-made and has everything a "real" bartender needs. My niece is thrilled and has already hosted two cocktail parties. It also came very quickly... faster than the books I ordered!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Geertz

customer_reviews.title: Great shaker set!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first cocktail shaker set I have owned and so far I love it. It came with everything I needed to make a bunch of different types of cocktails for me and my friends. So far I have had no problems with this product (No leaking, no damage) and am enjoying its use everyday.The customer service from the provider of this product is also fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Bryant Hertel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a professional set - I feel like a real bartender. I am enjoying trying new cocktails from the recipe booklet - which is most helpful. Everything arrived quickly and was packaged beautifully. I totally recommend WIN-WARE!
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my brother to start his own bar and it came in great packaging. Perfect for gifting and has everything you need to start channeling your inner mixologist! Also appreciate the followup customer-service call to check in and make sure all was well.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Great place to start bartending
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a great set. I bought it for a wedding, but have continued using it for many months after because it was such a solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Justin McElroy

product_meta.title: Winware Boston Cocktail Shaker Gift Set and Pocket Cocktail Guide with Winware Gift Box (6 Items)
product_meta.description: Great kit for professional bartending or home/recreation use.
feature_bullets: 1 x 30oz Boston Cocktail Shaker including Glass
1 x 4 Prong Hawthorn Strainer, 1 x 25ml Measure, 1 x 50ml Measure
1 x 28.5cm Bar Spoon with Masher, 1 x Wooden Muddler for crushing fruit, mint etc.
Items enclosed in WIN-WARE Gift Box, perfect gift idea for any occasion from Christmas to Mother’s day

Includes WIN-WARE pocket size cocktail making guide showing how to use the WIN-WARE Boston shaker and how to make some of the world’s favourite cocktails. This fits nicely into your wallet/purse for perfect party cocktails everytime,anywhere!
